title: Books Not Bans: Protect Student Access
short: Help us push back against local censorship efforts and fund a student-led awareness campaign at our public high schools.
description: Across our district, students are seeing more books challenged or removed from school librariesâ€”often without transparency or due process. This campaign will fund a student-designed outreach initiative to educate peers, parents, and school board members about the value of intellectual freedom and inclusive library collections. Funds raised will support printing materials, organizing events, and building an online hub to mobilize support.
